entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
